# Sensitivity test plot

```{r}

files <- list.files(path="cache", pattern="sfs_teosinte_CpG", full.names = TRUE)

df <- data.frame()
for(i in 2:6){
    msfs <- read.csv(files[i], header=TRUE)
    msfs$cutoff <- files[i]
    df <- rbind(df, msfs)
}

#GAMMA
library(ggplot2)
splot <- ggplot(df, aes(x=f, y=Freq, fill=cutoff)) + 
        geom_bar(stat="identity", position=position_dodge()) +
        #geom_histogram(aes(prior.s),bins=30,alpha=0.2,fill=cbPalette[1])+
        #scale_y_log10()+ 
        ylab("") + 
        theme(axis.text=element_text(size=10),axis.title=element_text(size=10)) + xlab("")
splot    
    

```
